Hi David,

On Fri, Sep 30, 2011 at 8:06 PM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:

> **
>
>
> Lewis,
>
> TestGoraStorage, if run as a Java application, does whatever its
> main() method tells it to, just like all Java classes do.
>
Thanks for this.

>
> The errors you're seeing seem specific to the database setup assumed
> by the tests, and are probably best diagnosed by people familiar with
> the application and test suite.
>
Yes his was where I thought it all went wrong as well. Thank you for
confirming that this was nothing to do with the JUnit test,

David Saff
>
> Thanks again
Lewis
